object.property: Instead of searching in the station list, just look up the above search term on google.
Instead of doing a cache search, go through the search functions on the directory service homepages. (UNIMPLEMENTED)
Start searching for above search term in the currently loaded station lists. Doesn't find *new* information, just looks through the known data.
A single word to search for in all stations.
In which fields to look for the search term.
In which fields to look for the search term.
Shoutcast links are %u or %pls, parsed m3u files are available with %g or %m3u, while %d or %srv represent direct URLs to the streaming servers.
Display favicons for individual music stations.
Show bookmark star for favourites in stream lists.
Use specific Gtk+ theme for Streamtuner2.
Save window state, sizes and selections automatically.
Prefer HTML traversing (PyQuery) over regex text matching.
<small>Most plugins intellegently fall back, but sometimes overriding the website extraction method can fix some station list update errors.</small>
Limit stream number per channel / category. <small>Some plugins use custom overrides.</small>
Update favorites from freshened stream URLs.
Keep and reuse temporary .m3u files for played stations.
Config directory. <small>This is determined by XDG_CONFIG_HOME.</small>
You can enable channels and plugins here. Changes take effect after restarting streamtuner2.
Either the last playing song, or a general description of the station.
Homepage icon for station. Points to a local cache file.
You can add extra information here, if you want. Useful for searching later. But take care that it gets reset on channel reloading.
this will take a few minutes
